title: Samsung embeds IronSource spyware app on phones across WANA
author: the-anarchist
aiHeadline: Samsung quietly installs spyware on your phone, because who doesn't want their data mined by Israeli companies?

title: Microsoft suspended the email account of an ICC prosecutor at The Hague
author: blinding-streak
aiHeadline: Microsoft takes a stand against international justice by suspending an ICC prosecutor's email, proving that Big Tech has a sense of humor.

title: We moved from AWS to Hetzner, saved 90%, kept ISO 27001 with Ansible
author: sksjvsla
aiHeadline: Company successfully moves from expensive AWS to cheaper Hetzner, saves 90%, and still meets all the standards, proving that sometimes cheaper is better.

title: U.S. strikes Iran's nuclear facilities
author: Liwink
aiHeadline: U.S. decides to strike Iran's nuclear facilities, because what better way to ensure peace than more conflict?

title: Tell HN: Beware confidentiality agreements that act as lifetime non competes
author: throwarayes
aiHeadline: Beware of confidentiality agreements that secretly bind you for life, because nothing says 'we own your career' like a lifetime non-compete.
